name: Angry Hills
summary:
This tiny worm speedy wants to fly through the air like a bird. But without any wings he has to slide along hills to build up speed, then take to the sky and soar. Sometimes he reaches the clouds. 

*****Features*****

+ a very simple one button control
+ smoothly physics
+ 2 different game modes
+ over 24 different islands

*****Instructions*****

Touch to gain speed down hill. Release your touch to fly through the sky.


Have fun with this very simple and addictive game.

Also available om iPhone and iPad!
